quotes.text: When you give joy to other people, you get more joy in return. You should give a good thought to happiness that you can give out.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Stay away from those people who try to disparage your ambitions. Small minds will always do that, but great minds will give you a feeling that you can become great too.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nature has given us all the pieces required to achieve exceptional wellness and health, but has left it to us to put these pieces together.
quotes.author: Diane McLaren

quotes.text: Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: It is only when we take chances, when our lives improve. The initial and the most difficult risk that we need to take is to become honest.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
quotes.author: Vernon Sanders Law

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: You’ll find that education is just about the only thing lying around loose in this world, and it’s about the only thing a fellow can have as much of as he’s willing to haul away.
quotes.author: John Graham

quotes.text: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.
quotes.author: Augustine Og Mandino

quotes.text: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.text: Be a positive energy trampoline – absorb what you need and rebound more back.
quotes.author: Dave Carolan

quotes.text: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.text: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realise I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
